verses.name: Judges 8:16
verses.text: And he took the elders of the city, and thorns of the wilderness and briers, and with them he taught the men of Succoth.

verses.name: Judges 8:17
verses.text: And he beat down the tower of Penuel, and slew the men of the city.

verses.name: Judges 8:18
verses.text: Then said he unto Zebah and Zalmunna, What manner of men were they whom ye slew at Tabor? And they answered, As thou art, so were they; each one resembled the children of a king.
